name: Magic Factory
slogan: The Startup Scalers - give your startup the competitive edge of a unicorn
description:
Magic Factory is the worlds first offshoring firm for startups. Our key goal is to enable startups with every competitive advantage big technological firms have and help them compete with them by remaining cost efficient. We are experts at launching innovative products, experimenting with MVPs and rapidly scaling them. 

We offer world class startup resources in :
-Software Engineering
-Data Analysis
-Product Design
-Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
-A/B testing and Experimentation
-Data Science.

Key USPs:
1. Top 1% resources - we hire only the top 1% resources so you get only the best working for you
2. Subject Matter Experts - our tribe based culture led by Subject Matter Experts gives you access to a pool of experts rather than the knowledge of just an individual
3. Startup Spirit- All our resources are driven with startup spirit and so share your passion
4. 100% in cost savings- Hiring us would help you save over 100% in Operating costs
5. Automation led Cost proofing

team.name: Suhas Vadyaraju
team.bioHtml: Advisor at MagicFactory - the worlds first offshoring firm for startups, Builds the worlds largest dating apps such as Bumble and Badoo, MBA from HEC Paris

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
jobs.description: We are building an engine that allows startups hire remote workers easily by viewing their profiles , prices and their skills on the fly. We are looking for our lead who can design and scale our initial MVP.
jobs.descriptionHtml: We are building an engine that allows startups hire remote workers easily by viewing their profiles , prices and their skills on the fly. We are looking for our lead who can design and scale our initial MVP.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Full Stack Developer 

About Magic Factory :


 

Magic Factory helps pre-Series A (Seed funded) startups become fast movers in their business and scale to get series A, by providing them with a world class and cost effective remote product development team.


 

Startups can hire Magic Factory’s employees on a monthly contract basis and get them to work as part of their own team. Our focus and target market at the moment is primarily startups with a ‘Product-Led’ GTM strategy.

Job Description: Join the tribe of highly experienced and rock-solid tech team of  "Full-Stack Developers". You'll be part of our elite pool of talent whom our esteemed clients can reach out to be a part of their product development or projects. As a full stack developer tribe member you'll be expected to :

Developing front end website architecture.

Designing user interactions on web pages.

Developing back end website applications.

Creating servers and databases for functionality.

Ensuring cross-platform optimization for mobile phones.

Ensuring responsiveness of applications.

Working alongside graphic designers for web design features.

Seeing through a project from conception to finished product.

Staying abreast of developments in web applications and programming languages.

As we believe knowledge sharing is a huge part of tribe learning and growth process we also look for exceptional team working ability. We value compassion, determination and entrepreneurial spirit.

Skillset preferred : HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript,jQuery, LESS, Angular,React JS,Java, Python, Ruby, .Net,MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle, SQLServer, Working with API (REST & SOAP).

Experience of minimum 3+ years as a full stack developer. You should also be passionate about start-ups and should be comfortable working in a remote team.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description:
Frontend Developer 

 

About Magic Factory :


 

Magic Factory helps pre-Series A (Seed funded) startups become fast movers in their business and scale to get series A, by providing them with a world class and cost effective remote product development team.


 

Startups can hire Magic Factory’s employees on a monthly contract basis and get them to work as part of their own team. Our focus and target market at the moment is primarily startups with a ‘Product-Led’ GTM strategy.

 

Job Description: Join the tribe of highly experienced and rock-solid tech team of  "Frontend Developers". You'll be part of our elite pool of talent whom our esteemed clients can reach out to be a part of their product development or projects. As a frontend developer tribe member you'll be expected to :

 

Use markup languages like HTML to create user-friendly web pages
Maintain and improve website
Optimize applications for maximum speed
Design mobile-based features
Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability
Get feedback from, and build solutions for, users and customers
Write functional requirement documents and guides
Create quality mockups and prototypes
Help back-end developers with coding and troubleshooting
Ensure high quality graphic standards and brand consistency
Stay up-to-date on emerging technologies
As we believe knowledge sharing is a huge part of tribe learning and growth process we also look for exceptional team working ability. We value compassion, determination and entrepreneurial spirit.
 

Skillset preferred :

Proven work experience as a Front-end developer
Hands on experience with markup languages
Experience with JavaScript, CSS and jQuery
Familiarity with browser testing and debugging
In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
Understanding of layout aesthetics
Knowledge of SEO principles
Familiarity with software like Adobe Suite, Photoshop and content management systems
An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
Excellent analytical and multitasking skills
 

Experience of minimum 3+ years as a frontend developer. You should be passionate about start-ups and should be comfortable working in a remote team.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description:
Backend Developer 

 

About Magic Factory :


 

Magic Factory helps pre-Series A (Seed funded) startups become fast movers in their business and scale to get series A, by providing them with a world class and cost effective remote product development team.


 

Startups can hire Magic Factory’s employees on a monthly contract basis and get them to work as part of their own team. Our focus and target market at the moment is primarily startups with a ‘Product-Led’ GTM strategy.

 

Job Description: Join the tribe of highly experienced and rock-solid tech team of  "Backend Developers". You'll be part of our elite pool of talent whom our esteemed clients can reach out to be a part of their product development or projects. As a backend developer tribe member you'll be expected to :

 

Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging
Write clean code to develop functional web applications
Troubleshoot and debug applications
Perform UI tests to optimize performance
Manage cutting-edge technologies to improve legacy applications
Collaborate with Front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server side logic
Gather and address technical and design requirements
Provide training and support to internal teams
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Liaise with developers, designers and system administrators to identify new features
Follow emerging technologies
 

Skillset preferred :

Proven work experience as a Back-end developer
In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)
Hands on experience with programming languages like Java, Ruby, PHP and Python
Working knowledge of CMS framework
Familiarity with front-end languages (e.g. HTML, JavaScript and CSS)
Excellent analytical and time management skills
Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude
 

Experience of minimum 3+ years as a backend developer.You should be passionate about start-ups and should be comfortable working in a remote team.

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.description:
UX Designer:

About Magic Factory :


 

Magic Factory helps pre-Series A (Seed funded) startups become fast movers in their business and scale to get series A, by providing them with a world class and cost effective remote product development team.


 

Startups can hire Magic Factory’s employees on a monthly contract basis and get them to work as part of their own team. Our focus and target market at the moment is primarily startups with a ‘Product-Led’ GTM strategy.

Job Description: Join the tribe of highly experienced and rock-solid tech team of  "UX Designers". You'll be part of our elite pool of talent whom our esteemed clients can reach out to be a part of their product development or projects. As a UX Designer tribe member you'll be expected to :

Understand product specifications and user psychology
Conduct concept and usability testing and gather feedback
Create personas through user research and data
Define the right interaction model and evaluate its success
Develop wireframes and prototypes around customer needs
Find creative ways to solve UX problems (e.g. usability, findability)
Work with UI designers to implement attractive designs
Communicate design ideas and prototypes to developers
Keep abreast of competitor products and industry trends
Skillset preferred :

Proven experience as a UX Designer, UI Designer or similar role
Strong portfolio of design projects
Background in project management and research
Familiarity with interaction design and information architecture
Proficient in design software (e.g. UXPin, Balsamiq)
Knowledge of HTML/CSS; JavaScript is a plus
Problem-solving aptitude
Analytical mind with a business acumen
Excellent communication skills
Experience of minimum 3+ years as a UX designer. You should be passionate about start-ups and should be comfortable working in a remote team.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description:
Data Analyst:

About Magic Factory :


 

Magic Factory helps pre-Series A (Seed funded) startups become fast movers in their business and scale to get series A, by providing them with a world class and cost effective remote product development team.


 

Startups can hire Magic Factory’s employees on a monthly contract basis and get them to work as part of their own team. Our focus and target market at the moment is primarily startups with a ‘Product-Led’ GTM strategy.

Job Description: Join the tribe of highly experienced and rock-solid tech team of  "Data Analyst". You'll be part of our elite pool of talent whom our esteemed clients can reach out to be a part of their product development or projects. As data analyst tribe member you'll be expected to :

Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports

Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality

Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems

Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets

Filter and “clean” data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems

Work with management to prioritize business and information needs

Locate and define new process improvement opportunities

Skillset preferred :

Proven working experience as a data analyst or business data analyst

Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques

Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc), databases (SQL etc), programming (XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks)

Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (Excel, SPSS, SAS etc)

Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy

Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings

Experience of minimum 3+ years as a data analyst. You should be passionate about start-ups and should be comfortable working in a remote team.
